context_or_repro: Google OAuth shows 'origin not allowed for client ID' error
root_cause: Google Cloud Console missing localhost origins
fix_summary: Need to add http://localhost:5173 and http://localhost:3000 to authorized origins in Google Cloud Console

context_or_repro: Stock data API calls fail with ERR_CONNECTION_REFUSED on port 5001
root_cause: Backend server not running
fix_summary: Started backend server and created .env files with proper configuration

context_or_repro: Server fails to start with 'Cannot find module ../websocket-client'
root_cause: Missing websocket-client module
fix_summary: Commented out the missing websocket import to allow server startup

context_or_repro: Backend still failing due to websocket references in code
root_cause: Code still referenced AlpacaWebSocketClient after import was commented
fix_summary: Disabled all websocket functionality and replaced with REST API fallback

context_or_repro: Launch script incorrectly reports backend startup failure
root_cause: Script PID detection logic was flawed and didn't wait long enough
fix_summary: Improved PID detection, added health check validation, and increased wait times

context_or_repro: Backend running but script still reports failure due to PID mismatch
root_cause: nohup PID capture doesn't match actual running process PID
fix_summary: Changed to health check first, then find actual PID from process list

context_or_repro: User reports 'Sign up Failed' error
root_cause: User trying to register with email that already exists
fix_summary: Confirmed signup functionality works correctly - error message is appropriate for duplicate email

context_or_repro: User reports 400 error on login but console shows registration error
root_cause: Console shows POST /api/auth/register 400 error from Signup.jsx
fix_summary: Added debug logging to both login and signup forms to identify exact issue

context_or_repro: User wants more helpful error messages instead of generic 400 errors
root_cause: Error messages were too technical and didn't help users understand what to do
fix_summary: Enhanced error messages in both frontend and backend to be more user-friendly and actionable

context_or_repro: Forms auto-refresh page when submitting
root_cause: Form submission causing page refresh instead of handling via JavaScript
fix_summary: Added preventDefault, stopPropagation, and button click handlers to prevent default form behavior

context_or_repro: Sign in button not working after form refresh fix
root_cause: Button onClick handler was preventing form onSubmit from working
fix_summary: Removed conflicting button click handlers and simplified form submission

context_or_repro: Server crashes on startup with MODULE_NOT_FOUND for ../websocket-client
root_cause: websocket-client.js was deleted but trading.js still required it
fix_summary: Commented out require and replaced initializeWebSocket with stub returning null WebSocket object; getStockQuote falls back to REST API

context_or_repro: User requested removal of Coin Starter Pack and addition of more useful shop items
root_cause: Coin Starter Pack was not useful; needed more variety in shop
fix_summary: Removed Coin Starter Pack; added XP Bundle (instant 200 XP), Lesson Skip Token (skip lessons), and Streak Freeze (3-day protection); implemented purchase logic and success messages

context_or_repro: Shop items activated immediately after purchase without inventory control
root_cause: Purchase handler auto-applied effects instead of deferring activation
fix_summary: Defer activation by storing purchases, add /shop/use API, and update inventory UI to trigger effects on demand

context_or_repro: Inventory card still showed no activate affordance for ready items
root_cause: UI only rendered buttons when IDs resolved correctly, leaving older purchases without a visible CTA
fix_summary: Guard resolvePurchaseId usage and render primary Activate button whenever an item is ready

context_or_repro: Inventory still showed boosters as auto-activated immediately after purchase
root_cause: Legacy purchase records were stored with active=true and never reset when fetched
fix_summary: Sanitize purchasedItems in user-data endpoint to reset stray active flags unless consumed; persist cleanup to storage (requires server restart to take effect)

context_or_repro: stockbuddy/src/globals.css
root_cause: Learn More button has white border that user wants removed
fix_summary: Button using btn-outline-light class and CSS border styling
verification: Removed btn-outline-light class, set border to none in CSS, matched Get Started Free button style with grey background

context_or_repro: Stock ticker not visible on home page
root_cause: Component starts with isVisible=false and only becomes visible after data loads, making it invisible if data fails or is still loading
fix_summary: Updated visibility logic to show component when data is available OR when loading, so it's always visible

context_or_repro: Stock ticker shows 'Loading market data' then fades away when backend returns 500 errors
root_cause: Visibility logic only kept component visible while loading; once loading completed with errors, isLoading became false and component faded away
fix_summary: Updated visibility logic to keep component visible when there's an error, and show error message instead of loading message when data fails

context_or_repro: Backend returning 500 errors for all stock quote requests, stock ticker not loading real-time data
root_cause: getStockQuoteFromREST function lacked error handling around Alpaca API calls, causing unhandled exceptions when API fails
fix_summary: Added try-catch around Alpaca API calls, improved error logging, and enhanced error messages in route handler

context_or_repro: stockbuddy/src/components/StockTicker.css
root_cause: Stock ticker not scrolling like it used to
fix_summary: CSS structure had parent as flex container with justify-content: space-between, preventing continuous scrolling animation
verification: Added wrapper div for scrolling content, moved animation to wrapper, added overflow: hidden to parent, removed justify-content: space-between

context_or_repro: User wants to double placeholder text and images to make home page longer
root_cause: Home page had 3 sections, user wanted more content
fix_summary: Duplicated all three sections (Track Portfolio, Learn Lessons, Simulate Trades) with staggered FadeInSection delays (450, 600, 750ms) to create 6 total sections

context_or_repro: Project Week 1 checklist required testing/CI baseline and auth hardening updates
root_cause: Repo lacked automated smoke tests, CI wiring, env validation, and rate-limited auth logging
fix_summary: Added Jest/Vitest smoke tests, root lint/test scripts, CI workflow, env validation with rotating auth logs, and rate limiting on login/OAuth endpoints

context_or_repro: AI coach chat nudged page on each message
root_cause: Unconditional scrollIntoView forced outer page scroll
fix_summary: Only auto-scroll when user is already near bottom using container ref and scrollTo

context_or_repro: Requested switch of AI Coach to Google Gemini API
root_cause: AI Coach still targeted OpenAI chat completions
fix_summary: Replaced provider wiring with Gemini client and updated diagnostics/test endpoints

context_or_repro: AI coach chat showed no reply after Gemini integration
root_cause: Gemini call returned empty/blocked responses and fallback required extra config
fix_summary: Set system-role instructions, bubbled block reasons, and short-circuited when neither Gemini nor Ollama configured

context_or_repro: AI coach chat renders Gemini markdown like **bold** as plain text
root_cause: Message renderer treated responses as plain strings
fix_summary: Add minimal markdown-to-HTML sanitizer and render via dangerouslySetInnerHTML while preserving scroll guard

context_or_repro: Uncaught ReferenceError: chatMessages is not defined at AICoach.jsx:276
root_cause: Merge conflict left references to chatMessages without hook initialization
fix_summary: Added useCoachChat hook call to provide chatMessages setChatMessages addMessage resetChat; replaced inline chat UI with CoachChat component; removed chat refs and auto-scroll useEffect (handled by CoachChat); made hook enabled state reactive using bouncePhase

context_or_repro: Server fails to start with 'Cannot find module ./certificatesubjecttokensupplier' in google-auth-library
root_cause: Corrupted node_modules installation - missing file in google-auth-library package
fix_summary: Removed node_modules and package-lock.json, reinstalled dependencies with npm install

context_or_repro: 'Loading market data' briefly appears on first page load even when cached data exists
root_cause: Component always started with isLoading=true and checked cache asynchronously, causing flash of loading state
fix_summary: Added synchronous cache check before render; initialize state with cached data if available; only show loading if cache is empty
verification: visual inspection on first page load
column16: AI analysis result caused frontend crash (blank screen) if response structure was incomplete
column17: Frontend accessed nested properties of potentially undefined objects; backend allowed partial objects
column18: Implemented defensive programming in frontend (optional chaining, fallbacks) and strict schema validation/filling in backend

context_or_repro: Removed Ollama fallback to ensure consistent AI model usage
root_cause: User requested strict model control; mixed providers caused confusion about response quality
fix_summary: Removed Ollama fallback logic in chat and analyze endpoints; now returns 503 if Gemini is not configured

context_or_repro: AI Coach chat messages were not syncing between submission handler and UI component
root_cause: AICoach and CoachChat both initialized independent useCoachChat hooks, so updates in one were not reflected in the other
fix_summary: Refactored CoachChat to be a controlled component accepting messages/handlers as props; hoisted state to AICoach parent

context_or_repro: AI analysis returned 500 error due to MAX_TOKENS truncation
root_cause: Analysis response (JSON) exceeded the 1500 token limit, causing Gemini to truncate and backend to throw generic error
fix_summary: Increased maxTokens to 8192 for analyze endpoint; added specific error handling for truncation

context_or_repro: MVP needed lockdown mode with waitlist for controlled beta access
root_cause: No mechanism to restrict access to approved users only
fix_summary: Added LOCKDOWN env flag, waitlist routes with JSON storage, invite system, Protected route guard, and Waitlist page

context_or_repro: Backend needed security hardening and consistent error handling
root_cause: Missing helmet, loose CORS, no env validation, inconsistent error responses
fix_summary: Added helmet middleware, restricted CORS, Zod env validation at boot, shared error handler with standard JSON shape

context_or_repro: Trading needed order validation and ALPACA_ENV safety enforcement
root_cause: No input validation on buy/sell, no protection against live trading
fix_summary: Added Zod order validation schema, ALPACA_ENV=paper enforcement, checkTradingAllowed guard, buy/sell endpoints

context_or_repro: Frontend needed error handling, 404 page, and skeleton states
root_cause: No error boundary, missing 404 page, no loading skeletons
fix_summary: Added ErrorBoundary class component, NotFound page, useSEO hook, skeleton components for chart/portfolio/chat

context_or_repro: CI workflows were in wrong location and missing security scanning
root_cause: Workflows in .github/ instead of .github/workflows/, no CodeQL or Dependabot
fix_summary: Moved workflows to correct location, added CodeQL for security scanning, added Dependabot for dependency updates

context_or_repro: Shimmer felt delayed before starting
root_cause: IntersectionObserver threshold too high delayed entry detection
fix_summary: Lowered threshold from 0.4 to 0.1 for earlier trigger

context_or_repro: Shimmer looked dim; wanted brighter glow
root_cause: Tracer band narrow and semi-opaque; no glow around text
fix_summary: Widened and intensified tracer band, increased gold contrast, added animated text glow

context_or_repro: Requested a visible light streak running through the shimmer
root_cause: Only two gradient layers; lacked distinct moving streak
fix_summary: Added a third, ultra-narrow white gradient layer synced with shimmer sweep

context_or_repro: Codebase cleanup following SOLID principles
root_cause: Duplicated authenticateToken middleware across routes; redundant tradingService.js; verbose debug logging in production code
fix_summary: Removed duplicate authenticateToken by reusing from auth.js; deleted tradingService.js (code already in trading.js); cleaned verbose console.log statements; created Documentation/README.md with remaining tasks

context_or_repro: Lesson content marked as incomplete but was already complete
root_cause: Legacy lessonContent.js unused; lessonStructure.js has full 25 lessons with quizzes
fix_summary: Deleted unused lessonContent.js; updated README to reflect completion; lesson system fully functional with 5 units 25 lessons
